products.title: Vitra Blackout Ash Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This ash grey blackout vertical blind adds a bold trending shade to your home, whilst blocking the light. Value for money and made from high-quality polyester-based fabric, your new grey blackout vertical blind is perfect for office, bedroom and living rooms. At swift direct blinds, not only is is this dark grey vertical blind hand made to your measurements, by their expert team, it also comes with a free five year guarantee.

products.title: Vitra Zinc (Blackout)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
